page.title: 13Entertainment for Children
page.content: Most of the children's entertainment in Carnoustie brings fun for all the family (unlike adult facilities). The{Beach Hall}in Carnoustie is a busy place in the summer-time.Every morning there are races - on the sand and in the sea.Wednesday morning is always different because of the puppet show.There are prize competi- tions for all the family - Daring Dads,Marvellous Mums,Cute Kiddies and others.In the evenings there are often discos and ceilidhs. The{Y.M.C.A.}is used all year round. A membership card is needed to use the facilities - table-tennis,weight- lifting,snooker and pool. The{Carnival}comes to Carnoustie for a six month season. About 4000 people visit from all round the area.The favourite amusements are the fruit machines.Candy-floss is also popular!
